channel.title: Soul Choice Radio
channel.description: Soul Choice, Canada's Premier Urban Record Pool presents Soul Choice Radio. Exclusive urban mixes by Canada's #1 DJs feature the best in hip hop. R&B, reggae, and much more. Shows are updated weekly and each podcast will feature mixes by different DJs. Exclusives, world premiers, dubplates and new music that can't be heard anywhere else. Take the full club experience home or on-the-go with these unique podcast mixed shows. Listeners can also check out www.soulchoice.ca for the latest entertainment news and info on our DJs.
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/
channel.itunes:author: Soul Choice Entertainment Group
channel.itunes:subtitle: Exclusive urban mixes by Canada's #1 DJs - featuring the best in hip hop. R&B, reggae, and more. Presented by Soul Choice Entertainment Group.
channel.itunes:summary: Soul Choice, Canada's Premier Urban Record Pool presents Soul Choice Radio. Exclusive urban mixes by Canada's #1 DJs feature the best in hip hop. R&B, reggae, and much more. Shows are updated weekly and each podcast will feature mixes by different DJs. Exclusives, world premiers, dubplates and new music that can't be heard anywhere else. Take the full club experience home or on-the-go with these unique podcast mixed shows. Listeners can also check out www.soulchoice.ca for the latest entertainment news and info on our DJs.
channel.itunes:keywords: Urban, hip hop, R&B, house, soca, calypso, reggae, rap, Reggaeton, soul, exclusive mixes, Canadian urban artists

item.title: Soul Choice Radio: November 17, 2006
item.description: P-Plus once again shows his versatility on the 1200s. On this edition of Soul Choice Radio P-Plus delivers an exclusive mix, featuring a hybrid of soul classics and house music that you can't find anywhere else.

item.title: Soul Choice Radio: October 24, 2006
item.description: After a brief hiatus, Soul Choice Radio is back!! Soul Choice continuously brings you the hottest exclusive mixes done by Canada's top club and radio DJs - you can subscibe now! On this episode, DJ Richy Rich brings the straight heat with exclusive vibes and remixes by artists such as Beenie Man, Ludacris, Mobb Deep, Justin Timberlake, and more. Don't miss it!

item.description: DJ Divsa's got next, bringin' some heat with the best of Summer 2006 - the perfect mix for that backyard BBQ or block-o. Divsa gives you a taste of some of the hottest joints of the year from Akon, Three 6 Mafia, Cassie, Rihanna, D4L and many more.

item.title: Soul Choice Radio: July 20, 2006
item.description: DJ Psychology puts Busta Rhymes in the spotlight for this edition of Soul Choice Radio! From Leaders of the New School to his explosion as a solo artist, Busta has maintained his colorful personality and unique style which put him on the hip hop map over a decade ago. Includes classic joints, hits and selections from his newest release, The Big Bang.

item.title: Soul Choice Radio: April 21, 2006
item.description: He's been in the game since the age of 16 and has arguably had the longest career in hip hop: LL Cool J is a living legend. His career has experienced ups and downs and he's also gone into acting, but has remained true to his first love, music. This Soul Choice Radio spotlight includes his biggest hits and collabos including Radio, Rock the Bells, Around the Way Girl, and countless others to let you know why the Ladies STILL Love Cool J.
item.itunes:author: DJ Psychology
item.itunes:subtitle: He's been in the game since the age of 16 and has arguably had the longest career in hip hop: LL Cool J is a living legend.

item.title: Soul Choice Radio: April 14, 2006
item.description: Soul Choice Radio pays tribute to the most prolific member of the Wu-Tang Clan, Ghostface Killah, a.k.a. Pretty Tony. He's laid tracks on some of hip hop's classic joints, both as a member of the Wu and as a solo artist. You'll hear them all on this not-to-be-missed edition of the show. Mixed by DJ Psychology.

item.title: Soul Choice Radio J Dilla Tribute!: March 2, 2006
item.description: A tribute to legendary hip hop producer/rapper Jay Dee (a.k.a. Jay Dilla - RIP). Hosted by Subliminal and mixed by DJ Psychology, this show acknowledges the sheer genius of one of the greatest hip hop producers; and has mixes of Dilla's lifetime of work from Slum Village, to JayLib to his work as part of The Ummah, and much more. Also contains excerpts of one of his rarely heard interviews. Produced by Agile.
item.itunes:author: DJ Psychology Hosted By Subliminal
